SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_PIC , A.MEMBER_STATE FROM MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TOPWORK_RELATION B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID WHERE B.TOPWORK_R_NO = #{topWorkRNo} GROUP BY A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_NAME, A.MEMBER_PIC, A.MEMBER_STATE
SELECT A.* FROM MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TOPWORK_RELATION B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN SUBWORK C ON B.TOPWORK_R_NO = C.TOPWORK_R_NO WHERE C.SUBWORK_NO = #{subWorkNo}

SELECT D.* , E.* FROM PROJECT_JOIN_STATE D INNER JOIN MEMBER E ON D.MEMBER_ID = E.MEMBER_ID WHERE D.PRO_NO = ( SELECT A.PRO_NO FROM PROJECT A INNER JOIN TOPWORK B ON A.PRO_NO = B.PRO_NO AND B.TOPWORK_NO = ( SELECT C.TOPWORK_NO FROM SUBWORK C WHERE C.SUBWORK_NO = #{subWorkNo} ) ) AND D.MEMBER_ID = ( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TOPWORK_RELATION WHERE TOPWORK_R_NO = ( SELECT TOPWORK_R_NO FROM SUBWORK WHERE SUBWORK_NO = #{subWorkNo} ) )
SELECT A.SUBWORK_PROGRESS , B.PRO_NO , A.TOPWORK_NO FROM SUBWORK A LEFT JOIN TOPWORK B ON A.TOPWORK_NO = B.TOPWORK_NO WHERE SUBWORK_NO = #{subWorkNo}
